org.springframework.cloud.cloudfoundry

Class CloudFoundryClientAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.cloudfoundry.CloudFoundryClientAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="spring.cloud.cloudfoundry",
                       name={"username","password","org","space"})
 @ConditionalOnClass(name={"reactor.core.publisher.Flux","org.cloudfoundry.operations.DefaultCloudFoundryOperations","org.cloudfoundry.reactor.client.ReactorCloudFoundryClient","org.reactivestreams.Publisher"})
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=CloudFoundryProperties.class)
public class CloudFoundryClientAutoConfiguration
extends Object
    Provides auto-configuration for the Reactor-based Cloud Foundry client v3.x.
    Author:
    Josh Long, Ben Hale
